price: 8. Kuwase xaqa diida, hoog (iyo halaag) baa u sugnaaday, (Allena) wuu burin camalladooda.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū fataʿsan lahum wa-aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: and He will cause to be lost
